entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 05:45 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %

Dewpoint: -9.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
